description: Material handling machinery and equipment, hauling and various equipment to the force area at RTC EF equivalents.
full_summary:
================
### Tender Announcement: E60HS-21FRKL

#### Document Information
- **Document Title**: Notice of Proposed Procurement
- **Document Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
- **Reference Number**: M5000-25-0068/A
- **Publication Date**: May 13, 2024
- **Closing Date**: May 29, 2024, 16:00:00
- **Location**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

#### Procurement Information
- **Procurement Category**: Government of Canada (GD)
- **Method of Procurement**: Competitive – Selective Tendering
- **Basis of Selection**: Lowest Price (PSPC Supply Arrangement # E60HS-21FRKL/A)

#### Solicitation Details
- **Procurement Region**: Canada
- **Multiple Delivery Regions**: Alberta and Manitoba
- **Delivery Locations**:
  - RCMP K Division, Edmonton, Alberta
  - RCMP D Division, Winnipeg, Manitoba
- **Scope of Work**: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires two Group 4 C, electric walkie-stacker, counterbalance forklift truck, ancillary items, and integrated logistics support items including training.

#### Important Details
- **Submission Requirements**:
  - Bidders must submit their tenders electronically to NWR_Procurement_bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
  - Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
  - Tenders must be received on or before March 31, 2025
- **Canada’s Integrity Regime**: Canada will apply integrity provisions in accordance with the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Supply Arrangement
- **Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**: The procurement notice is available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities

#### Contracting Entity Information
- **Contracting Entity Name**: RCMP Procurement and Contracting Services
- **Contact Information**:
  - Shailesh Rajgor
  - shaileshkumar.rajgor@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
  - 780-670-8554 (phone)

#### Trade Agreements
The tender is also open to businesses that participate in the following trade agreements:
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CK
